scripts.clean: cd cx-portal-shared-components && yarn clean && cd ../cx-portal && yarn clean
scripts.build:docker: if [ -d "./cx-portal/build" ]; then yarn build:docker:prebuilt; else yarn build:docker:full; fi
scripts.build:licenses: find node_modules -name package.json -exec jq -r '.|"\(.name),\(.version),\(.license)"' {} \; | sort | uniq > cx-portal/public/third-party-licenses.txt
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:licenses && cd ./cx-portal-shared-components && yarn build:lib && yarn build:storybook && cd ../cx-portal && yarn build
scripts.deploy:helm:dev003: cd chart && helm install -f values-dev003.yaml portal cx-portal --namespace portal
